text:
University of Minnesota
Seoul National University of Korea Cooperative Project
Minneapolis 14
OFFICE OF THE CAMPUS COORDINATOR
May 12, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Suite 1119
1346 Connecticut Avenue, Northwest
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
Just a note to tell you, if the information has not already
reached you, that the editorial which I wrote for the November-
December, I960 issue of the NAEB Journal, was translated Into
German and appears in the March-April, 1961 issue of Volkshochschule
ig Westen (page 72) under the title "Wird die *Lehrmaschine* den
Lehrer verdrahgen?"
I am enclosing a copy of the letter about the use of this
editorial by the magaiine, which reached me under separate cover.
I felt sure that the comments both about the editorial and the
NAEB Journal would be appreciated by all concerned.
With best wishes to you and to the NAEB, I am.
Sincerely,
Coordinator
cc -Ifr. Schooley
Mrs. McKensie
